fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Immediately reroll into another Town role, but the name gains the prefix of "Survivor".
- That new role also gains the attribute "You cannot die at night. You just fucking can't. I do not care what it is that tries to kill you, it fucking can't. Does it bypass this? NO IT FUCKING DOESN'T. NOTHING BYPASSES THIS. ANYTHING THAT TRIES WILL FUCKING DIE."
